text: <@U462P0B1R> can we get a progress report on the test cases?
Here are the things I have Think we need to test against

Subreddit:
-Does the subreddit exist?
-Does the input have special characters?
-Subreddits can exist, but if there are no posts, than we get an error
-Subreddit can have a post but no comments, will cause error
-Subreddit can exist, but if it is banned/blocked/forbidden, will cause error

Top Comments:
-Is input an int? Is the first character of input a 0?
-something like 04 will cause an error
-input int needs to be greater than 0 for the foundit script to work
-TopCommentLimit can be greater than the actual amount of comments
-input NEEDS to be only ints, check for this

Top Words:
-Basically the same as Top Comment tests
top comment and top word inputs both need to be greater than 0
In busy all tonight and tomorrow so you guys are kinda on your own for this one
